net.joala.image

Interface OutputImageBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ImageBuilder<Void>, ImageIOImageBuilder<Void>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultOutputImageBuilder

    public interface OutputImageBuilder
extends ImageIOImageBuilder<Void>
    Since:
    2013-02-21

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Void build()
      Write the specified image to the selected output file.
      OutputImageBuilder height(int value)
      Sets the height of the image which must be greater than 0.
      OutputImageBuilder imageType(ImageType value)
      Sets the image type.
      OutputImageBuilder mimeType(MimeType value)
      Set the mime-type for the image to create.
      OutputImageBuilder mimeType(String value)
      Set the mime-type for the image to create.
      OutputImageBuilder output(Object value)
      Set the output which might be of type File, RandomAccessFile or OutputStream.
      OutputImageBuilder width(int value)
      Sets the width of the image which must be greater than 0.
